definition: arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

sentences.english: Systole presses heighten , diastolic pressure drops , pressing of arteries and veins also increases accordingly.
sentences.chinese: 收缩压增高，舒张压下降，脉压也相应增大。

sentences.english: Objective To explore relationship between pulse pressure and heart rate variability in hypertensive patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨高血压患者脉压与心率变异性改变的关系。

sentences.english: Objective To research the significance and change of pulse pressure(PP)in elderly patients with acute cerebral infraction.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究老年急性脑梗死患者脉压的变化及意义。

sentences.english: Wide pulse pressure, water hammers pulse.
CAN Pulse Pressure Predict White Coat Effect in Treated Hypertensive Patients?
sentences.chinese: 脉压测定可帮助预测“白大衣”高血压？

sentences.english: The paper has introduced the clinical application and the research progresses of pulse pressure.
sentences.chinese: 本文将介绍脉压的临床应用及有关的研究进展。

sentences.english: With the higher pulse pressure and aging, the incidence of the plaque of carotid artery is increased.
sentences.chinese: 年龄增大，脉压增加，颈动脉斑块发生率增高。
